Project.Brief history of your project and organi: HK Aikr is a leading algorithmic trading firm that enhances market seamlessness and accessibility through algorithms, expanding the boundaries of finance. As a global liquidity provider, we continuously inject vitality into the market, driving efficiency, transparency, and innovation in the crypto market.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: As a market maker for Binance, a large exchange, we use high-frequency trading strategies, generating a large amount of transaction data and log data every second, as well as the market information data we have accumulated over a long period of time.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We will package the historical data into car files and send them to SP, transfer the new files to SP local cluster through IPFS to package them into car files, and then send the orders to SP through boost.
